```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
```

```{r setup}
library(UN.SDG.03)
library(dplyr, warn.conflicts = FALSE)
library(ggplot2)

filter(sdg_03_series, indicator == "3.4.1")
```

```{r}
code <- "SH_DTH_NCOM"
title <- filter(sdg_03_series, series_code == code) |> pull("series_description")
sdg_03_data[[code]] |>
  ggplot(aes(x = time_period, y = value, group = geo_area_name)) +
  geom_line() +
  ggtitle(title) +
  facet_grid(rows = vars(sex))
```

```{r}
code <- "SH_DTH_NCD"
title <- filter(sdg_03_series, series_code == code) |> pull("series_description")
sdg_03_data[[code]] |>
  ggplot(aes(x = time_period, y = value, group = geo_area_name)) +
  geom_line() +
  ggtitle(title) +
  facet_grid(vars(name_of_non_communicable_disease), vars(sex))
```
